languages.text: "Благодарю. Их истории не будут забыты, но сохранятся в легендах Ордена. Мы, Волки, не умираем до конца — мы уходим охотиться в Кьялхалле, и однажды вернемся в сей мир для последней битвы. Славный будет день воссоединения братьев!"

"Thank you. Their stories will not be forgotten, but will live on in the Chapter's legends. We wolves do not fully die — we leave to hunt in Kjalhalla, and one day we will return to this world for the final battle. Glorious will be the day when we brothers are reunited!"
languages.original_text: "Благодарю. Их истории не будут забыты, но сохранятся в легендах Ордена. Мы, Волки, не умираем до конца — мы уходим охотиться в Кьялхалле, и однажды вернемся в сей мир для последней битвы. Славный будет день воссоединения братьев!"

traits.locale_text: "Thank you. Their stories will not be forgotten, but will live on in the order's legends. We wolves do not fully die — we leave to hunt in Kjalhalla, and one day we will return to this world for the final battle. Glorious will be the day when we brothers are reunited!"

"Thank you. Their stories will not be forgotten, but will live on in the order's legends. We wolves do not fully die — we leave to hunt in Kjalhalla, and one day we will return to this world for the final battle. Glorious will be the day when we brothers are reunited!"

"Thank you. Their stories will not be forgotten, but will live on in the order's legends. We wolves do not fully die — we leave to hunt in Kjalhalla, and one day we will return to this world for the final battle. Glorious will be the day when we brothers are reunited!"

"Thank you. Their stories will not be forgotten, but will live on in the Chapter's legends. We wolves do not fully die — we leave to hunt in Kjalhalla, and one day we will return to this world for the final battle. Glorious will be the day when we brothers are reunited!"

languages.text: «Gracias. Sus historias no caerán en el olvido, sino que perdurarán en las leyendas del capítulo. Los lobos no morimos del todo, sino que nos marchamos a cazar en Kjalhalla. Algún día, regresaremos a este mundo para la batalla final. ¡El día en el que los hermanos se reúnan será verdaderamente glorioso!».
languages.original_text: "Thank you. Their stories will not be forgotten, but will live on in the Chapter's legends. We wolves do not fully die — we leave to hunt in Kjalhalla, and one day we will return to this world for the final battle. Glorious will be the day when we brothers are reunited!"

traits.locale_text: «Gracias. Sus historias no caerán en el olvido, sino que perdurarán en las leyendas de la orden. Los lobos no morimos del todo, sino que nos marchamos a cazar en Kjalhalla. Algún día, regresaremos a este mundo para la batalla final. ¡El día en el que los hermanos se reúnan será verdaderamente glorioso!».

languages.text: “谢谢你，他们的故事不会被遗忘，而会在战团的传说中继续流传。我们这些野狼们不会真正地死去，我们会去卡尔哈拉狩猎。总有一天，我们会回到这个世界，参加最后的战斗。原兄弟们再次聚首的那天无比光荣！”
languages.original_text: "Thank you. Their stories will not be forgotten, but will live on in the Chapter's legends. We wolves do not fully die — we leave to hunt in Kjalhalla, and one day we will return to this world for the final battle. Glorious will be the day when we brothers are reunited!"

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你，他们的故事不会被遗忘，而会在军团的传说中继续流传。我们这些野狼们不会真正地死去，我们会去卡尔哈拉狩猎。总有一天，我们会回到这个世界，参加最后的战斗。原兄弟们再次聚首的那天无比光荣！”

languages.text: 「ありがとう。彼らの物語は忘れられることはなく、戦団の伝説として生き続けるだろう。俺たちウルフは完全になくなるわけではない。俺たちはヴァルハラへ狩りに行き、いつか最後の戦いのためにこの世界に戻ってくる。俺たち兄弟が再会する日は栄光の日となるだろう！」
languages.original_text: "Thank you. Their stories will not be forgotten, but will live on in the Chapter's legends. We wolves do not fully die — we leave to hunt in Kjalhalla, and one day we will return to this world for the final battle. Glorious will be the day when we brothers are reunited!"

traits.locale_text: 「ありがとう。彼らの物語は忘れられることはなく、伝説として生き続けるだろう。俺たちウルフは完全になくなるわけではない。俺たちはヴァルハラへ狩りに行き、いつか最後の戦いのためにこの世界に戻ってくる。俺たち兄弟が再会する日は栄光の日となるだろう！」

languages.text: « Merci. Leur histoire ne sera pas oubliée, elle survivra dans les légendes de notre chapitre. Nous autres Wolves ne mourons jamais vraiment. Nous partons chasser à Kjalhalla en attendant d'être rappelés dans ce plan d'existence pour livrer l'ultime bataille. Glorieux sera le jour de nos retrouvailles ! »
languages.original_text: "Thank you. Their stories will not be forgotten, but will live on in the Chapter's legends. We wolves do not fully die — we leave to hunt in Kjalhalla, and one day we will return to this world for the final battle. Glorious will be the day when we brothers are reunited!"

traits.locale_text: « Merci. Leur histoire ne sera pas oubliée, elle survivra dans les légendes de notre ordre. Nous autres Wolves ne mourons jamais vraiment. Nous partons chasser à Kjalhalla en attendant d'être rappelés dans ce plan d'existence pour livrer l'ultime bataille. Glorieux sera le jour de nos retrouvailles ! »

languages.text: "Vielen Dank. Ihre Geschichten werden nicht vergessen werden, sondern in den Legenden des Ordens weiterleben. Wir Wölfe sterben niemals ganz. Wir gehen nach Kjalhalla, um dort zu jagen, und eines Tages kehren wir für den letzten Kampf auf diese Welt zurück. Glorreich wird der Tag sein, an dem wir Brüder wiedervereint werden!"
languages.original_text: "Thank you. Their stories will not be forgotten, but will live on in the Chapter's legends. We wolves do not fully die — we leave to hunt in Kjalhalla, and one day we will return to this world for the final battle. Glorious will be the day when we brothers are reunited!"

traits.locale_text: "Vielen Dank. Ihre Geschichten werden nicht vergessen werden, sondern in den Legenden des Ordens weiterleben. Wir Wölfe sterben niemals ganz. Wir gehen nach Kjalhalla, um dort zu jagen, und eines Tages kehren wir für den letzten Kampf auf diese Welt zurück. Glorreich wird der Tag sein, an dem wir Brüder wiedervereint werden!"

languages.original_text: "Thank you. Their stories will not be forgotten, but will live on in the Chapter's legends. We wolves do not fully die — we leave to hunt in Kjalhalla, and one day we will return to this world for the final battle. Glorious will be the day when we brothers are reunited!"

languages.text: "Sağ olasın. Hikâyeleri unutulmayacak, Tümen'in efsanelerinde yaşamaya devam edecek. Biz kurtlar hiçbir zaman tam olarak yok olmayız. Avlanmak için Kjalhalla'ya göçeriz. Bir gün nihai savaş için bu dünyaya geri döneceğiz. Kardeşlerime kavuştuğum gün, en şanlı günümüz olacak!"
languages.original_text: "Thank you. Their stories will not be forgotten, but will live on in the Chapter's legends. We wolves do not fully die — we leave to hunt in Kjalhalla, and one day we will return to this world for the final battle. Glorious will be the day when we brothers are reunited!"

traits.locale_text: "Sağ olasın. Hikâyeleri unutulmayacak ve Tümen'in efsanelerinde yaşamaya devam edecek. Biz kurtlar hiçbir zaman tam olarak yok olmayız. Kjalhalla'da avlanmak için sağ kalırız. Bir gün nihai savaşımız için bu dünyaya geri döneceğiz. Kardeşlerime kavuştuğum gün, en şanlı günümüz olacak!"
